Text: PGEs Risk Management Committee Meetings Cc Rod I was asked to include you by phone in all future Risk Management Committee meetings Following is a list of upcoming meetings for the remainder of the year Please use to participate in all of the meetings listed below October am PDT November am PDT December am PDT Please let me know if you have any questions regarding these meetings Thank you Cristal Metz Executive Assistant PGE
